name: Mediterranean Rice Salad with Vegetables
author: lacucinadinadia
summary: This colorful Mediterranean rice salad is a great summertime dish. I used fresh zucchini, carrots, and bell peppers, but you can add any vegetable you like. Replace rice with couscous, farro, or barley, if you prefer.
ingredients: ½  yellow bell pepper, cut into cubes
½  red bell pepper, cut into cubes
directions: Bring water and rice to a boil in a saucepan
Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until rice is tender and liquid has been absorbed, 18 to 20 minutes
Remove from heat and pour enough cold water on top of the cooked rice to cover it
Drain well; transfer rice into a bowl
Stir in 1 tablespoon olive oil and season with herb salt
Mix capers, parsley, and lemon zest in a small bowl; add to rice
Mix in zucchini, carrots, yellow bell pepper, and red bell pepper
Season with remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil, lemon juice, and salt
